column1: Local Foods////*The crunchy chicken sandwich (of course). Grilled? or steamed chicken (NOT fried) with veggies and a creamy sauce on a robust pretzel bun. The crunch here mostly comes from the bun
column2: which was a pleasant surprise. How does that saying go? You can't have your cake and eat it too? Well
column3: you can have a crunchy chicken sandwich
column4: and eat healthy too. Boom. Roasted.
